<template>
  <input type="text" v-model="itemName" />
  <button @click="update()">Edit</button>
  <button @click="hide()">Cancel</button>
</template>

<script>
import axios from "axios";

export default {
  data() {
    return {
      itemName: ""
    }
  },
  mounted() {
    this.itemName = this.name;
  },
  props: {
    id: { type: Number, required: true },
    name: { type: String, required: true }
  },
  methods: {
    updateItem() {
      axios
        .put(`api/items/${this.id}`, { id: this.id, name: this.itemName });
    }
  },
  watch: {
    value(newValue) {
      this.itemName = newValue;
    },
  },
};
</script>
